name: Shape Valley
description:
This is an elaborated version of a game made in the span of 48 hours for my game development class.

A small village full of shape people have been attacked by menacing dark-grey squares with white eyes and have captured so many of the residents. Will you be the one to rescue the villagers and return the peace to the valley?

Taking on the role of a Circle,  the savior of Shape Valley, you will find a way to help everyone!

Controls:

WASD - to move your character

Space - To interact and pick up items
